songs.title: Some Say
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
Some say that life just ends, I say it never begins
Some say that heaven is a place away in space
Some say that we don't have the knowledge
I say, "Who are you to judge?"
Some say that we are just a problem
They think we're heathens

[Chorus]
But think before you make up your mind
You won't even be alive when I do this all alone
So when I'll fall, I'll take you all and forever I will roll

[Verse]
Some say that life just ends, I say it never begins
Some say that heaven is a place away in space
Some say that we don't have the knowledge
I say, "Who are you to judge?"
Some say that we are just a problem
They think we're heathens

[Chorus]
But think before you make up your mind
You won't even be alive when I do this all alone
So when I'll fall, I'll take you all and forever I will roll

[Outro]
All I need, a little more lying to myself
So I won't look high upon the shelf
Cobwebs and grime, my mirrored self
There's no white glove test for you
Deep down I know, so I refuse
And that's when I learned to never say whether it's real or a dream
